3ed84c36-302e-4fb8-b02d-3f1019a52e79.name: 2 - Choose 30 points in Advantages from the following list:

c0adfa57-0490-4391-b6ce-e2f52d2d8a5d.name: Claim to Hospitality [varies]
c0adfa57-0490-4391-b6ce-e2f52d2d8a5d.notes: A teacher or fellow student, or other practitioners generally

features.situation: from members of your religion and those who respect your faith

a4c56914-a38f-49fd-9384-719c1cb04f6f.name: Cultural Familiarity (Choose a culture)
a4c56914-a38f-49fd-9384-719c1cb04f6f.notes: Do not suffer the normal -3 penalty for unfamiliarity

bbc35bd7-e18a-45bd-b475-8c4b71d32768.name: Indomitable
bbc35bd7-e18a-45bd-b475-8c4b71d32768.notes: Impossible to influence through ordinary words or actions

b6553435-f87c-48a0-8813-10b770d32623.name: Less Sleep
b6553435-f87c-48a0-8813-10b770d32623.notes: Require 1 hour/level less sleep for a full night's rest (max 4)

193b24c1-c661-4c32-9081-d67e2fbadaba.name: Longevity
193b24c1-c661-4c32-9081-d67e2fbadaba.notes: You fail aging rolls only on a 17 or 18, or only on an 18 if your modified HT is 17 or better

1f9524ce-d0b1-49d3-af7c-fe398dfbd3e6.name: Specialized
1f9524ce-d0b1-49d3-af7c-fe398dfbd3e6.notes: @Type: Angels, Demons, Elementals, Faerie, Ghosts, etc.@

03f1f9bb-ba5a-4610-9ef5-9d19d413e612.name: 3 - Choose -30 points in Disadvantages from the following list:

d40f64f7-30fb-4349-9e98-e72e7d93dd3e.name: Code of Honor (Professional)
d40f64f7-30fb-4349-9e98-e72e7d93dd3e.notes: Adhere to the ethics of your profession; always do your job to the best of your ability; support your guild, union, or professional association.

45377a95-6084-4e51-96e0-b7f0769da7b8.name: Magical
45377a95-6084-4e51-96e0-b7f0769da7b8.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

80515ebd-4b23-48eb-a186-35979d970157.name: Magical
80515ebd-4b23-48eb-a186-35979d970157.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

67dd6fe7-5c51-4763-882d-26e4724ba2c9.name: Magical
67dd6fe7-5c51-4763-882d-26e4724ba2c9.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

0f206399-c36f-433a-87f3-e096760c8f13.name: Projection
0f206399-c36f-433a-87f3-e096760c8f13.notes: Can use abilities on material world

26f402ce-6d85-47bc-979e-801ea8bb8f9b.name: Magical
26f402ce-6d85-47bc-979e-801ea8bb8f9b.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

4c57574d-40e6-47b5-be79-56af97f1d2ec.name: Magical
4c57574d-40e6-47b5-be79-56af97f1d2ec.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

13711c7b-54bf-4c9f-9403-e5f6cd6c2ceb.name: Magical
13711c7b-54bf-4c9f-9403-e5f6cd6c2ceb.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

b996faa4-85da-49b2-b0dc-1d5fed61a589.name: Magical
b996faa4-85da-49b2-b0dc-1d5fed61a589.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

3aa77e03-f22e-4b8f-9b9d-a67ffb61ad15.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

6b6353c0-c5b9-49b1-a943-f4dfc1260478.name: Magical
6b6353c0-c5b9-49b1-a943-f4dfc1260478.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

7627fe17-745d-4bd6-9932-54f15b5d2170.name: Magical
7627fe17-745d-4bd6-9932-54f15b5d2170.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

7e941054-2261-4e7b-926e-11a030435abb.name: Directional
7e941054-2261-4e7b-926e-11a030435abb.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

8d9dea1b-25ab-47a6-8087-ea981d0b7859.name: Tough Skin
8d9dea1b-25ab-47a6-8087-ea981d0b7859.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

ee6d9a81-bf50-4208-9c45-d7667f635683.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

fdcf5cdd-4dd0-48f6-a54a-525d210054df.name: Magical
fdcf5cdd-4dd0-48f6-a54a-525d210054df.notes: Requires ambient Mana, and vulnerable to anti-powers.

2fedcccf-0507-4229-9086-8cbe1a8d4005.name: 6 - Choose -25 points in Disadvantages from the following list:

ddaaf02f-68aa-43a1-9008-86035d0c3537.name: Absent-Mindedness
ddaaf02f-68aa-43a1-9008-86035d0c3537.notes: Once adrift in your own thoughts, you must roll against Perception-5 in order to notice any event short of personal physical injury

features.situation: to all IQ and IQ-based skill rolls, save those for the task you are currently concentrating on

ff29568b-ebc9-4c7f-b6d9-2df81075b091.name: Charitable
ff29568b-ebc9-4c7f-b6d9-2df81075b091.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge

26f00274-9423-4a82-aa17-c5177fc69b4e.name: Curious
26f00274-9423-4a82-aa17-c5177fc69b4e.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

eb2be77d-801b-406e-a3fb-944d3043ebec.name: Nightmares
eb2be77d-801b-406e-a3fb-944d3043ebec.notes: Make a self-control roll each morning upon awakening. If you fail, you suffered nightmares; this costs you 1 FP that you can only recover through sleep. On a roll of 17 or 18, you are left shaking, and are at -1 to all skill and Perception rolls for the entire day.

b793d4a5-89e8-4699-a296-de1c60b13f9b.name: Truthfulness
b793d4a5-89e8-4699-a296-de1c60b13f9b.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must keep silent about an uncomfortable truth (lying by omission). Roll at -5 if you actually have to tell a falsehood! If you fail, you blurt out the truth, or stumble so much that your lie is obvious.

cfd1e3e4-d55c-47ef-b60a-a4aae849cfe8.name: Vow (Choose a Minor, Major or Great Vow) [varies]

d9067376-cedf-49cc-980f-ff1cd03ec006.name: 9 - Choose one Skill from the following list:

8dfcf739-e1e5-4f09-9cb4-cbdc0162bd7a.name: 10 - Choose one Skill from the following list:

df69f22e-138f-43fa-bc48-d75b7bed4dd7.text: Forget about spells and instead take abilities based on advantages, with modifiers that make them look magical  and call them spells. In principle, just about any power could be defined as magical, and any template with superpowers could be called a magician by changing the Super modifier to the Magical modifier. But classic comic-book mages often have fairly specific abilities.

3f06c3c4-b20a-48b2-87c8-5e17d97d6e7d.text: The mystic is built to fit that pattern. Point cost for the mystic is 500.
